definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Today the hanbok is still worn during formal occasions.
sentences.chinese: 現在在正式場合人們仍會穿韓服。

sentences.english: This movie is Korea KartRider Flag Mode play.
sentences.chinese: 這是個韓服搶旗模式的視頻。

sentences.english: The hanbok consists of a shirt (jeogori) and pants (baji).
sentences.chinese: 韓服由一件襯衣與褲子組成。

sentences.english: Hallyu hanbok which he does through a dream.
sentences.chinese: 韓流韓服，他確實通過一個夢。

sentences.english: That the presentation of this beautiful, hanbok attract a lot of people.
sentences.chinese: 大長今裏那一套套美麗的韓服吸引了不少人。

definition: to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
